Test Name: FOXL2 Mutation Analysis by Next-Generation Sequencing
Purpose: To detect mutations in the FOXL2 gene in tumor samples using next-generation sequencing.
Container: 10% neutral buffered formalin container for FFPE tissue blocks or slides
Equipment: Microtome, thermocycler, Qubit fluorometer, NGS sequencer, Bioanalyzer/TapeStation, computer with analysis software
